task.summary: Default task
Modified Camera class to allow setting a function that would allow determination of whether the camera can move or not. FirstPersonCamera now works smoothly
Fixed vector3 a bit to work with ComponentPosition for now. Need to add procedural content generation and collision detection for 3d and 2d next.
The process' initializeGL is called before initialize is now. Loads when window shows up.
Added an imageRepository which is used to prevent double loading of images and textures. Also merged text object with image as they were practically the same class.
Added 2 dimensional collision detection between two rectangles.
Anything 2d now has the traditional game coordinate system 0, 0 in top left. Fixed problem where widthRatio and heightRatio were not being set properly.
Can now remove entities from storage.
Did stuff.

Combined Text and Image a bit more. Fixed a big memory leak caused by not releasing the IntBuffers for the garbageCollector when drawing an image or text. Need to fix text glitch that make things wierd because of 3 lines of text.
Loading has been implemented. Now images can be loaded ahead of time.
Tried fixing buffers being resused to no avail. Added PerlinNoise for PCG
Added method to camera to check if allowed to move up.
Made a toString method for ComponentColor, made HashCode for Vector3 more unique.
Added a hashCode method to Vector4
Images and Text can now look at camera now only using Yaw
Added lighting, even if it's crude lighting. Will improve upon it later.
EventHandler can now take input as a string.
Did fixes as well as some utility maintenance
Did some fixing, image buffers are better. Need to fix RawModel buffers now.
Big fixes. Especially the buffer problem. I swear i am 2 thirds retard
Take input should now only take readable characters between 32 and 126
Fixed matrix math for rotating on the Y axis
Added AnimatedRawModel for animations of multiple rawmodels (or even just 1) by position and rotation. Will add scaling soon.
Added some basic error handling to keep the program running after it has errors. TODO make a better error system, possibly with popup windows and fancy error codes
Did some work on editing animation frames.
Fixed AnimationRawModel cloneFrame, added ModelNames to AnimatedRawModel
Added Animation Frame interpolation if enabled with interval set by max frames.
Added ComponentScale, AnimatedRawModels can now use Scale when animating. Fixed clone some more.
Added ComponentScale, AnimatedRawModels can now use Scale when animating. Fixed clone some more.
Added some things to the camera(S)
Added equals method for ComponentPosition, fixed Camera to have buffer in between rotation and position updates as well as a way to get the real position
Lighting works as semi desired. No specular. With specular it flickers.
Added capability for directional lighting.
Started doing shadowmapping. Need to plan more before i can continue.
Added NoiseSettings
Added a Noise central abstract class, also added a simplex noise and a new perlin noise that can be used for 3 dimensions.
Going to add some gharbage noise to the mix
Did some vector work
Going to add a ThirdPersonCamera sometime soon
Improved firstpersoncamera a bit, with camera locking.
Allow changing of the NextScene being loaded.
Images and text can now be colored
Text can now be wrapped. Added a UtilString method.
I think i fixed the problem where scene was called before load.
Added a ThirdPersonCamera that looks at a point that is specified.
ThirdPersonCamera can now be switched for orbitting around the point with movement, or move the target position.
Added unProject method to shaderProgram, used to get world coordinates given screen coordinates
Made the ability to draw RawModels directly without needing a component. Systems can now be both logical and render allowing different functions to be called.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
